Text: Looking forward to working with you Cc Jeff Greg Thank you for your offer to work with you to build the Xcelerator We made my acceptance official today and am looking forward to building successful businesses with the team at Enron I will be happy to begin in Houston this Monday the th if you think it is important that we get started immediately otherwise Ill take a few days to get things settled before starting work the following week on Monday the th Please let me know if you have a strong preference In addition if there are any materials that I could review before arriving to better understand what ground has been covered by the Xcelerator and other growth initiatives or to better understand Enron in general then I would appreciate the chance to review them if you can direct me to the source Thanks again for this wonderful opportunity Im looking forward to making it a success Heath Heath Schiesser

thank youJeff Thank you for taking the time to discuss the Xcelerator again this morning I am excited about the prospect of joining the team and am confident that I can help you to grow some great new businesses Greg Whalley and I spent a couple of hours discussing it this evening With some changes in place that Ive proposed to David Oxley Id be ready to help you and the team open this new chapter for Enron Please let me know if you have any questions or comments Thanks again Heath Heath Schiesser

thank youJeff Thanks for taking the time to speak with me today about the Xcelerator I enjoyed the chance to hear your thoughts on the effort and appreciated the opportunity to speak with Greg as well Through our discussion it is clear why he is a respected leader in the mafia Please feel free to contact me if you wish to discuss the Xcelerator further Thanks again Heath Heath Schiesser
